blocks.name: cbviunf
blocks.content: Rule used to change the bound variables in an indexed union, with the substitution specified implicitly by the hypothesis. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.) (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbviunf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s1, c0, c2)), diffss(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4i(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s1, c0, c2), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  abbii(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  cbvrexf(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iun(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm cbviunf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, c2)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ F/(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ F/(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ (s0 = s1 â†’ c1 = c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, c2), d(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4i(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, c2), { hs0 | âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)}, { hs0 | âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c2)})
  abbii(hs0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1), âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c2))
  cbvrexf(s0, s1, c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âˆˆ c2)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq2d(hs0, c1, c2, s0 = s1)
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iun(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: iuneq12daf
blocks.content: Equality deduction for indexed union, deduction version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iuneq12daf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c3))
} = {
  sylib(w0, wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, c3)), wal(hs0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  bitrd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  rexbida(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wceq(c0, c2))
  rexeqf(s0, c0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  bitr4i(wal(hs0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))), wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, c3)), wceq(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  abbi(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  eqeq12i(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, c3), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, c3))
  âŠ£ F/(s0, w0)

  sylib(w0, â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, c3), âˆ€(hs0,(âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)â†” âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3))))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, (âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)â†” âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3)))
  bitrd(w0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c3))
  rexbida(s0, c0, w0, hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âˆˆ c3)
  eleq2d(hs0, c1, c3, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  syl(w0, (âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c3)â†” âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3)), c0 = c2)
  rexeqf(s0, c0, c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3)
  bitr4i(âˆ€(hs0,(âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)â†” âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3))), â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, c3), { hs0 | âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)} = { hs0 | âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3)})
  abbi(hs0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3))
  eqeq12i(â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, c3), { hs0 | âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1)}, { hs0 | âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c3)})
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: iunin1f
blocks.content: Indexed union of intersection. Generalization of half of theorem "Distributive laws" in [Enderton] p. 30. Use ~ uniiun to recover Enderton's theorem. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2004.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunin1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ciun(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  r19.41(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cin(c1, c2))
  elin(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  r19.41(s0, c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âˆˆ c2)

  anbi1i(hs0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), hs0 âˆˆ c2, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c1))

blocks.name: ssiun3
blocks.content: Subset equivalence for an indexed union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssiun3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wss(c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitr2ri(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wss(c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c1, c2)))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c1, c2))))
  dfss2(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c1, c2)))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c1, c2)), wrex(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eliun(s1, cv(s0), c1, c2)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

}

blocks.name: iinssiun
blocks.content: An indexed intersection is a subset of the corresponding indexed union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls))
  3imtr4g(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ex(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  r19.2z(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, c1)
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ssiun2sf
blocks.content: Subset relationship for an indexed union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssiun2sf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, ciun(s0, c1, c3)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))
} = {
  pm2.43i(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, ciun(s0, c1, c3)))
  vtoclgf(s0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, ciun(s0, c1, c3))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wss(c3, ciun(s0, c1, c3))))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, ciun(s0, c1, c3)))
  nfel(s0, c0, c1)
  nfss(s0, c2, ciun(s0, c1, c3))
  nfiu1(s0, c1, c3)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wss(c3, ciun(s0, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, ciun(s0, c1, c3)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  sseq1d(c3, ciun(s0, c1, c3), c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  ssiun2(s0, c1, c3)
}

  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’ c2 âŠ† â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c3))
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c0)

blocks.name: iundifdif
blocks.content: The intersection of a set is the complement of the union of the complements. TODO: shorten using ~ iundifdifd . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Sep-2016.)

thm iundifdif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cint(c0), cdif(c1, ciun(s0, c0, cdif(c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wss(c0, cpw(c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cint(c0), cdif(c1, ciun(s0, c0, cdif(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl5req(cint(c0), cdif(c1, ciun(s0, c0, cdif(c1, cv(s0)))), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, cint(c0))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  difeq2i(c1, ciun(s0, c0, cdif(c1, cv(s0))), cdif(c1, cint(c0)))
  eqtr4i(ciun(s0, c0, cdif(c1, cv(s0))), cdif(c1, cint(c0)), cdif(c1, ciin(s0, c0, cv(s0))))
  iundif2(s0, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  difeq2i(c1, cint(c0), ciin(s0, c0, cv(s0)))
  intiin(s0, c0)
  sylib(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, cint(c0))), cint(c0)), wss(cint(c0), c1))
  3syl(wne(c0, emptycls), wss(cint(c0), c1), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(cpw(c1))))
  jctl(wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
  intssuni2(c0, cpw(c1))
  biimpi(wss(cint(c0), cuni(cpw(c1))), wss(cint(c0), c1))
  sseq2i(cint(c0), cuni(cpw(c1)), c1)
  unipw(c1)
  dfss4(cint(c0), c1)

  fof(c4, c0, c2)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wfo(c4, c0, c2))
  foelrn(s0, c4, c0, c2, cv(s1))

  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

  3sstr4g(ciun(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), c2), ciun(s1, c0, c3), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), w0)

  eximi(s0, wa(wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
